import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";
import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import ResponseSamples from "@theme/ResponseSamples";

import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import Markdown from "@theme/Markdown";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Create a snapshot of a dashboard</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/perses-pulic/api/v1/projects/{folderId}/dashboards/{uid}/snapshot"}></MethodEndpoint>



Creates a snapshot of a specific dashboard.


## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"in":"path","name":"folderId","required":true,"description":"The ID of the folder where the dashboard is located.","schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"in":"path","name":"uid","required":true,"description":"The ID of the dashboard to create a snapshot for.","schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"201"} value={"201"}><div>

Snapshot created successfully

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"snapshotUrl"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":"https://snapshot.logz.io/dashboard-1-snapshot"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"snapshotUrl\": \"https://snapshot.logz.io/dashboard-1-snapshot\"\n}"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
